channel.title: Why did?
channel.description: Dylan and Assassins Creed lose their Moparscape MCW awards?

item.title: Why did?
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:24, topic:303317”][quote author=`Aaron link=topic=399642.msg2966324#msg2966324 date=1253592450]

That award is only supposed to be given to one person at a time, each time a new winner comes up it is removed from the old one and given to the new. It doesn’t mean the person isn’t deserving or anything, it’s just a temporary reward.

So why did 2 others get the award?
[/quote]

They were given the award when the contest ended. We were thinking about adding a new award when the contest restarted, but that was practically pointless. Dylan will still be honored for winning it originally, but I can’t go into detail about it right now.[/quote]

That’s understandable, thanks for clearing up my cluelessness.

Read full topic

item.title: Why did?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:21, topic:303317"][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=399642.msg2966322#msg2966322 date=1253592271]
That award is only supposed to be given to one person at a time, each time a new winner comes up it is removed from the old one and given to the new. It doesn’t mean the person isn’t deserving or anything, it’s just a temporary reward.
[/quote]

So why did 2 others get the award?[/quote]

They were given the award when the contest ended. We were thinking about adding a new award when the contest restarted, but that was practically pointless. Dylan will still be honored for winning it originally, but I can’t go into detail about it right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Why did?
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

The Reaper X:

Obviously it was a mistake, or they simply forgot to hold up to the actual meaning behind the reward.

My guess is that they both had the same amount of experience and it ended in a tie and they both got the award.

Read full topic

So why did 2 others get the award?

@moparisthebest wrote:

That award is only supposed to be given to one person at a time, each time a new winner comes up it is removed from the old one and given to the new. It doesn’t mean the person isn’t deserving or anything, it’s just a temporary reward.

item.title: Why did?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:17, topic:303317"][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=399642.msg2966307#msg2966307 date=1253591479]

[quote author=`Aaron link=topic=399642.msg2966301#msg2966301 date=1253591160]

He asked for ban.
[/quote]Why can’t he retain himself via his own will power. Must we actually request a support to help us from our mscp addictions?

I’m pretty sure the badge was only supposed to be given to them for a few weeks anyway.

When it started, that’s what I was lead to believe as well.

Reaper, i do believe Dylan still deserves it, he earned it and didn’t show it off as a badge for superiority, he still models and does good.
[/quote]I don’t have a clue then. I’ve seen his models before, I know what you’re saying. But you can’t give a belt to the same person more than twice if you know what I mean.

Btw, about your signature. Moparscape is in a cycle of renovation and demolition. Constantly being improved while constantly filled with inherited garbage from generations of members. There’s no repairing, it is what it is; the way I think of it anyways.

I understand where you’re coming from, but with all due respect we need to keep trying to make Moparscape a step up from trash, we need to analyze the system from every angle and find ways to exploit the good in Moparscape, no one can say we have nothing good here because we do, and we have a lot of bad.[/quote]ie. offtopic threads ;] message me with any further discussion, we’re derailing the shit out of this.

Read full topic

item.title: Why did?
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:16, topic:303317”][quote author=`Aaron link=topic=399642.msg2966301#msg2966301 date=1253591160]

[quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=399642.msg2966294#msg2966294 date=1253590899]

He asked for ban.
[/quote]Why can’t he retain himself via his own will power. Must we actually request a support to help us from our mscp addictions?

I’m pretty sure the badge was only supposed to be given to them for a few weeks anyway.

When it started, that’s what I was lead to believe as well.

Reaper, i do believe Dylan still deserves it, he earned it and didn’t show it off as a badge for superiority, he still models and does good.
[/quote]I don’t have a clue then. I’ve seen his models before, I know what you’re saying. But you can’t give a belt to the same person more than twice if you know what I mean.

Btw, about your signature. Moparscape is in a cycle of renovation and demolition. Constantly being improved while constantly filled with inherited garbage from generations of members. There’s no repairing, it is what it is; the way I think of it anyways.[/quote]

I understand where you’re coming from, but with all due respect we need to keep trying to make Moparscape a step up from trash, we need to analyze the system from every angle and find ways to exploit the good in Moparscape, no one can say we have nothing good here because we do, and we have a lot of bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Why did?

He asked for ban.
[/quote]Why can’t he retain himself via his own will power. Must we actually request a support to help us from our mscp addictions?

I’m pretty sure the badge was only supposed to be given to them for a few weeks anyway.

When it started, that’s what I was lead to believe as well.

Reaper, i do believe Dylan still deserves it, he earned it and didn’t show it off as a badge for superiority, he still models and does good. [/quote]I don’t have a clue then. I’ve seen his models before, I know what you’re saying. But you can’t give a belt to the same person more than twice if you know what I mean.

Btw, about your signature. Moparscape is in a cycle of renovation and demolition. Constantly being improved while constantly filled with inherited garbage from generations of members. There’s no repairing, it is what it is; the way I think of it anyways.

Read full topic
